testcase.classname: Verify and validate It Business Book Functionality
testcase.name: : Register Functionality - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given user navigates to the website.........................................passed When User clicks on Sign up and it switches to Sign up Options..............passed And user enters firstname "steve"...........................................passed And user enters lastname "rogers"...........................................passed And user types Email into "steve@gmail.com" text box........................passed And user types password "rogers@123"........................................passed And user clicks on Terms/Conditions checkbox................................passed Then user clicks on getstarted button to register...........................passed

testcase.classname: Verify and validate It Business Book Functionality
testcase.name: Login Functionality
testcase.system-out: Given user clicks on SignIn option..........................................passed When User enters email into Text Field......................................passed And Then user enters password...............................................passed Then login must be successful...............................................passed

testcase.classname: Verify and validate It Business Book Functionality
testcase.name: Jobs Functionality
testcase.system-out: When User click Jobs and moves to Find a job and click it...................passed And user enters job title into textbox......................................passed And user clicks on search button............................................passed

testcase.classname: Verify and validate It Business Book Functionality
testcase.name: Logout Functionality
testcase.system-out: When User clicks on profile.................................................passed And user moves the cursor to logout and clicks logout button................passed Then user clicks ok to logout...............................................passed
